title: Website Survey
post: I want to collect a bit of a survey about the Gaehive website, as I will be refreshing things and releasing a major update probably next year or so. <br><br>Really I have three questions: <br>1.) What is a feature(s) that you don't like or you don't think are necessary? <br>2.) What is a feature(s) you'd like to see? <br>3.) What is a feature(s) you like to see improved/changed? <br><br>Please respond  <a href="https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/33687618/comments/#comments-233286304">here</a>. Thank you!! :heart:
